## Required Textbooks

#### [Collaboration and Team Science: A Field Guide](https://brdo.berkeley.edu/sites/default/files/teamscience_fieldguide_reduced.pdf){target="_blank"} ("Team Science Field Guide" in weekly readings)

#### Dare to Lead (hard copy provided to all students; "DtL" in weekly readings)

#### [Dare to Lead Workbook](run:\pdfs\DTLWorkbook.pdf){target="_blank"} ("DtL Workbook" in weekly assignments)

## Weekly Reading and Assignments

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

package.list <- c('gt', 'tidyverse')

## Installing them if they aren't already on the computer
new.packages <- package.list[!(package.list %in% installed.packages()[,"Package"])]
if(length(new.packages)) install.packages(new.packages)

## And loading them
for(i in package.list){library(i, character.only = T)}


tibble(
  Week = c("1", "",
           "2", "",
           "3", ""),
  Day = c("8/29", "8/31",
          "9/5", "9/7",
          "9/12", "9/14"),
  Reading = c("<a href = '/pdfs/CheruvelilSoranno2018.pdf'>Cheruvelil & Soranno 2018</a>_DtL: Intro and Part 1, Section 1_(pages 1-43)",
              "",
              "Team Science Field Guide: pages iii-3_ <a href = '/pdfs/Cheruvelil2014.pdf'>Cheruvelil et al. 2014</a>",
              "",
              "DtL: Part 1, Sections 2-3_(pages 44-177)",
              "Team Science Field Guide: pages 5-19"),
  Assignment = c("DtL Workbook:_Section 1, Exercise 1_Section 1, Exercise 2", 
                 "Elevator Pitch",
                 "",
                 "True Colors Assessment",
                 'DtL Workbook:_Section 2, Exercise 1_Section 2, Exercise 4',
                 '<a href = "https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScY8EtcrPqe0WgVPFOl-ONgyIhULFC9VaxqiGiAmjhNvtzaXA/viewform">Myers Briggs Assessment</a>')
) %>%
  mutate(Reading = str_replace_all(Reading, "_", "<br>"),
         Assignment = str_replace_all(Assignment, "_", "<br>")) %>% 
  mutate(Reading = map(Reading, gt::html),
         Assignment = map(Assignment, gt::html)) %>%
  gt() %>%
  tab_options(table.font.size = 20,
              column_labels.font.weight = 'bold',
              column_labels.font.size = 20) %>%
  opt_horizontal_padding(scale = 3) %>% 
  cols_align(align = c("left"),
  columns = everything() )%>%
  fmt_markdown(columns = TRUE)
  

```
